allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: initialize React + Vite + TypeScript project

- Set up Vite development environment with React and TypeScript
- Configured TypeScript with strict mode and modern ESNext settings
- Added Telegram Mini Apps SDK (@tma.js/sdk, @tma.js/sdk-react)
- Added TON Connect UI integration (@tonconnect/ui-react)
- Created standard Vite project structure with React components
- Verified dev server runs successfully on http://localhost:5173

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

- Improve stat cards responsiveness with flexible widths

EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C /Users/daniillogachev/Work/p331-telegram-platform add src/contexts/ModalContext.tsx src/App.tsx src/components/Header/Header.tsx src/pages/HomePage/HomePage.tsx src/components/Section/Section.module.css src/components/CashOutModal/CashOutModal.tsx src/components/CashOutModal/CashOutModal.module.css)

Bash(git -C /Users/daniillogachev/Work/p331-telegram-platform commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(ui\): comprehensive UI improvements and cashout functionality

UI Bug Fixes:
- Move wallet address display below connect/disconnect button in profile
- Make entire welcome bonus banner clickable \(not just button\)
- Center "Most Popular Games" section title
- Add hover effects to bonus banner

Modal System:
- Create ModalContext for cross-component modal management
- Update Header to use global modal state
- Connect bonus banner to AddTon modal via context

Cashout Improvements:
- Require wallet connection before cashout
- Auto-fill connected wallet address for cashout
- Show "Connect Wallet" button when wallet not connected
- Display connected wallet address in cashout modal
- Validate minimum $6 withdrawal amount

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
